= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Genitalia - parasympathetic uterus vasodilators (uterus-parasympathetic)*: female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow; sexual response by directing blood flow to the pelvis and to the external genitalia, including the ovaries, vagina, labia, and clitoris
  * *Genitalia - parasympathetic vaginal vasodilators (vagina-parasympathetic)*: female - contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, increased blood flow
  * *Genitalia - utetovaginal visceral receptors (utetovaginal-visceral-receptors)*: sexual sensations
  * *Genitalia - corpus cavernosum clitoridis (corpus-cavernosum-clitoridis)*: clitoral erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood
  * *Genitalia - corpus cavernosum penis (corpus-cavernosum-penis)*: penile erection; simultaneously the ischiocavernosus and bulbospongiosus muscles compress the veins of the corpora cavernosa restricting the egress and circulation of this blood
  * *Genitalia - visceral sexual receptors (visceral-sexual-receptors)*: sexual sensations
  * *Genitalia - bulbospongiosus muscle (bulbospongiosus-muscle)*: in males, empties the urethra; in females, clenches the vagina
  * *Genitalia - external sphincter muscle of female urethra (external-sphincter-female-urethra)*: control urination, constricts urethra, maintain urinary continence
  * *Genitalia - external sphincter muscle of male urethra (external-sphincter-male-urethra)*: control urination, constricts urethra, maintain urinary continence
  * *Genitalia - ischiocavernosus muscle (ischiocavernosus-muscle)*: stabilize the erect penis or (in females) tense the vagina during orgasm
  * *Genitalia - testicle gland (testicle-gland)*: produce androgens, primarily testosterone (growth of muscle mass and strength, regulator of cognitive and physical energy, sperm development
  * *Genitalia - ovary gland (ovary-gland)*: secretes estrogen (maturation and maintenance of the reproductive organs), testosterone (prepares the uterus for pregnancy, and the mammary glands for lactation) and progesterone (promoting menstrual cycle changes in the endometrium
  * *Genitalia - uterus, sympathetic receptors (uterus-sympathetic)*: contraction of smooth muscles of myometrium, decreased blood flow, loss of erection
  * *Genitalia - vagina, sympathetic receptors (vagina-sympathetic)*: vasoconstriction of fibromuscular tube, loss of erection
